Combat.levelreq: You are not a high enough level to use this ability.

Combat.stunblocking: You are stunned and can't block.

Commandoutput.apirevoked: {00} has had their api access revoked!
Commandoutput.helpfooter: Type in any command followed by {00} for parameters and usage information.
Commandoutput.invalidparameters: Invalid parameters provided! Use {00} to get more info about a command.
Commandoutput.notfound: Command not recoginized. Enter help for a list of commands. Remember console commands are case sensitive!
Commandoutput.parseerror: Parse Error: Parameter could not be read. Type {00} {01} for usage information.
Commandoutput.syntaxerror: Syntax Error: Expected parameter not found. Type {00} {01} for usage information.

Commands.announcementdesc: Desc: Sends a global message to all users playing the game.
Commands.announcementhelp: sends a global message to all players
Commands.bandesc: Desc: Bans a player from the server.
Commands.banhelp: bans a player from the server
Commands.cpsdesc: Desc: Prints the current CPS. The status flag tells if the server loop is locked or unlocked. The lock flag locks the cps while the unlock flag unlocks it.
Commands.apidesc: Desc: Sets the api access (enabled/disabled) of a selected account. 1 is enabled, 0 is disabled
Commands.apihelp: enables or disables api access for an account
Commands.exiting: Server is now closing. Please wait while your game and player data is saved!
Commands.kickdesc: Desc: Kicks a player from the server.
Commands.kickhelp: kicks a player from the server
Commands.killdesc: Desc: Kills a player on the server.
Commands.killhelp: kills a player on the server
Commands.migratedesc: Desc: Walks you through migrating your player or game database between sqlite and mysql.
Commands.migratehelp: walks you through migrating your player or game database between sqlite and mysql
Commands.mutedesc: Desc: mutes a player preventing them from talking.
Commands.mutehelp: mutes a player preventing them from talking
Commands.poweraccdesc: Desc: Sets the power or access of a selected account. Power 0 is regular user. Power 1 is in-game moderator. Power 2 is owner/designer and allows editor access.
Commands.poweracchelp: sets the administrative access of an account
Commands.powerdesc: Desc: Sets the power or access of a selected account. Power 0 is regular user. Power 1 is in-game moderator. Power 2 is owner/designer and allows editor access.
Commands.powerhelp: sets the administrative access of a user
Commands.unbandesc: Desc: Unbans a player from the server.
Commands.unbanhelp: unbans a player from the server
Commands.unmutedesc: Desc: unmutes a player allowing them to talk.
Commands.unmutehelp: unmutes a player allowing them to talk

Database.usingsqlite: Using SQLite Database for account and data storage.

Portchecking.accessible: Your game is accesible to the public!
Portchecking.checkantivirus: 2. Antivirus programs might also be blocking connections and you may need to add Intersect Server.exe to your antivirus exclusions.
Portchecking.checkfirewalls: 1. Firewalls might be blocking connections to your server. Check firewalls on your system. (i.e. iptables, FirewallD, Windows Firewall)
Portchecking.checkrouterupnp: It appears that UPnP Failed. Your might need to enable UPnP on your router or manually port forward to allow connections to your server.
Portchecking.letothersjoin: Enter your public ip and port into the client/editor config for others to join!
Portchecking.notaccessible: It does not appear that your game is accessible to the outside world.
Portchecking.notconnected: Could not retreive connection information from AGD servers. Do you have an internet connection?
Portchecking.screwed: 3. If on a college campus, or within a business network you likely do not have permission to open ports or host games in which case you are screwed!
